pkgmetadata.longdescription: # PiWaterflowThis is a resilient watering system, executed in a Raspberry Pi to control irrigation valves using relays.It's intended to be executed periodically (i.e. cron every 5 minutes).- Requirements: - Raspberry Pi (any model) - Relays to control the valves - Optional control relay to enable alternative power inverter- It supports 2 watering programs every day. - Programs can be forced at any time.- Valves can be manually triggered.- Programs, forced programs and manual Valves can be manually stopped.- Metrics can be emitted to influxdb to register actions (programs and valves).- This package fits with piwwwaterflow, so that it can be controlled via HTTP page.TODO:- Abort watering if humidity is above threshold (90% default).
